Description.Name: This Man's Tank
Description.Details: Resourceful as you are, you managed to wrangle a tank from your ancestry and brought it with you, along with a trusted friend to drive it. Should be prepped for combat in a day or two. Bonus Tank!

OptionDescription: Resourceful as you are, you managed to wrangle a tank from your ancestry and brought it with you, along with a trusted friend to drive it.
